definition: capacity/quantity/amount/to estimate/abbr. for 量詞|量词[liang4 ci2], classifier (in Chinese grammar)/measure word

sentences.chinese: 它是時間計量器的形狀。

sentences.english: Distribution measured with the dishwasher uses.
sentences.chinese: 配合洗碗機分配計量器使用。

sentences.english: This paper provides a method to determine volume of metal tank by weighting.
sentences.chinese: 介紹了採用秤重方法測定金屬量器的容量值的方法。

sentences.english: An extension of the spindle shaft drives a counter for totalizing discharge.
sentences.chinese: 心軸的延長部分帶動一個累計流量的計量器。

sentences.english: They're blueprints of the gauges you wrote us about.
sentences.chinese: 這就是你寫信告訴我們的那些計量器的藍圖嗎？

sentences.english: The warehouses have certified truck scales and railroad, as well as grain dryers.
sentences.chinese: 該倉庫有認證的車重計量器和鐵路以及糧食烘乾機。

sentences.english: This text introduced evaluation of uncertainty for the verification of little glass volume meter.
sentences.chinese: 本文對小玻璃量器檢定的測量不確定度進行了評估。

sentences.english: Used to measure the weight from a liquid volume.
sentences.chinese: 用於量度從量器中排出液體的體積。

sentences.english: A gauge for indicating negative atmospheric pressure.
sentences.chinese: 用來顯示負大氣壓的測量器。

sentences.english: The description of design principles of horizontal gauge is presented.
sentences.chinese: 該文提出了橫向雨量器的設計原理。

sentences.english: Changes in soybean water status have also been measured by beta ray gauging .
sentences.chinese: 大豆水分狀況的變化也已用射線計量器測出。

sentences.english: Added a countermeasure to prevent double running of wave triggers.
sentences.chinese: 增加了一個交戰測量器來防止波段觸發器的重複運行。

sentences.english: The adjusted accuracy is close to that of pit gauge;
sentences.chinese: 訂正後的精度接近於坑式雨量器的測量精度。

sentences.english: Cooperate with dishwasher distribution meter use.
sentences.chinese: 配合洗碗機分配計量器使用。

sentences.english: Then said I to the angel that talked with me, Whither do these bear the ephah?
sentences.chinese: 我問與我說話的天使說，她們要將量器擡到哪裏去呢。

sentences.english: The same measuring apparatus made trades fair so that disputes became less.
sentences.chinese: 量器統一，童叟無欺，糾紛就少，民間一團和氣。

definition: liter and decaliter dry measure/(fig.) meager quantity of foodstuff
well sweep (device for raising and lowering a bucket in a well, using a pivoted pole)
ancient ceramic three-legged vessel used for cooking with cord markings on the outside and hollow legs
ancient bronze food vessel with a round mouth and two or four handles/round basket of bamboo
